segments.text: This one looks great ! I love the seashore .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So do I . The sun ... the sand ... the ocean !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And listen to this ! What do you think of sailing , swimming , windsurfing , and fishing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Tom ! They sound fantastic . I really like all those things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , except fishing . To be honest , I hate fishing , but I love all the others .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey ! Look at this ! We can stay in a big hotel or we can stay in a little cabin by the beach .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know . I really don't those big hotels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Neither do I . Let's stay in a cabin.It ' ll be much nicer right beside the ocean .
segments.speaker: S1
